pages.text: One of the multiblocks in this pack allows you to convert Blaze Meshes into Glowstone Blocks using some materials and a decent chunk of mana, the following pages will have images of the completed multiblocks and a visualization of said multiblock. $(br2)The required items are listed on the last page.
Note: This recipe has a byproduct of 3 Luminessence.

pages.title: Glowstone
pages.text: Costs: $(br)$(li)$(#33FFFF)Mana Powder$(li)$(#FF9100)Blaze Powder$(li)$(#FF0000)Redstone Dust$(br2)$()Mana: 1/5th of a pool
